DOC.brief_summary: The study investigate non-inferior efficacy Paroxetine Controlled Release Paroxetine Immediate Release , well drug tolerability profile treat patient Major Depression .
DOC.brief_title: A Local Register Study For Major Depression Of Paroxetine Controlled Release
DOC.criteria: Patients Major Depressive Disorder , score depression rating scale reach specific point ( 17 item Hamilton Depression Scale > 18 ) . Exclusion criterion : patient use monoamine oxidase inhibitor ( MAOIs ) , benzodiazepine , Chinese herbal medicine , acupuncture , moxibustion psychoactive medication zolpidem , zopiclone ; diagnose Axis I disorder ; responsive paroxetine therapy ; pregnant lactating , serious medical disorder condition would preclude administration paroxetine ; history seizure disorder ( except febrile seizure childhood ) ; require treatment warfarin anticoagulant , phenytoin , cimetidine , sumatriptan , type 1C antiarrhythmic , quinidine sulfonylurea derivative ; substance abuse dependence ( alcohol drug ) within 6 month prior trial ; electroconvulsive therapy within 2 month entry study ; pose current , serious suicidal homicidal risk ; take psychotropic drug antidepressant MAO inhibitor within 7 day baseline MAO inhibitor within 14 day baseline ; take investigational drug , participate clinical trial within past 3 month ; hypersensitivity paroxetine ; undergo formal psychotherapy/psychoanalysis .
